results.description: French knife manufacturer specializing in high-quality folding pocket knives with innovative locking mechanisms and forged blades, combining industrial precision with artistic design.

additional_info.specialties: Forged nitrogen-enriched steel blades, double-cone locking systems, and modern EDC (Everyday Carry) designs

results.notes: Founded by Pascal Jodas (industrial metallurgy expert) and Jean-Pierre Sucheras (two-time 'Best Worker of France'). Produced via Arno-Industrie, a Thiers-based forging company. The T3 model (2013 release) features a patented twisted spring mechanism.

}

results.description: AGA Campolin is a renowned Italian knife manufacturer specializing in handcrafted automatic stilettos and switchblades, blending traditional craftsmanship with modern design. The brand is celebrated for its high-quality leverlock, picklock, and swinguard mechanisms, producing knives ranging from classic stilettos to tactical models.

additional_info.specialties: Automatic knives, Italian stilettos, leverlock/picklock mechanisms, limited-edition collectibles

results.notes: The official website (agacampolin.com) features product catalogs, company history, and news updates. The brand collaborates with collectors and maintains a showroom in Austria. While founded in Italy, operational headquarters moved to Austria per historical records[13][15].
